show_name: Dirty Pair: From Lovely Angels with Love (OAV)
other_title: Dirty Pair: Lovely Angels yori Ai o Komete (Japanese)
ダーティペア ラブリーエンジェルより愛をこめて (Japanese)
plot: Kei and Yuri investigate a counterfeiter with a large amount of electronic defense gadgets/robots and then try to stop a megalomaniac from holding Chief Gooley and Eleanor City hostage.
opening_theme: "Ru-Ru-Ru-Russian Roulette" (ロ・ロ・ロ・ロシアンルーレット) by Meiko Nakahara
ending_theme: "Uchū Ren'ai (Space Fantasy)" (宇宙恋愛[スペースファンタジー]) by Meiko Nakahara
